ygData.subject: On wizzards
ygData.msgSnippet: There have been many more posts after I said I would stop posting on this subject.  Do not think I am ignoring any of you, or that your posts aren t getting to
ygData.messageBody:
There have been many more posts after I said I would stop posting on this
subject. Do not think I am ignoring any of you, or that your posts aren't
getting to one list ... they are, I just needed to end that thread, it was
starting to get to the point it was not civil.

To all you young wizards who might have been scared away from your class, do
not take the one man's opinion on them, make your own opinion.

I will not tell you it is easy, you have the lowest health in the game, and
no pet ... which makes life difficult (I don't think it is possible to get an
"easy" rating as a wizard) But in a group... you are the prime finisher of
monsters.

The many posts I have gotten say that other people have not had as bad an
experience as the previous poster. Many of them are doing more damage than
him, and not being resisted as often as he says (except on reds!), and
casting faster than him.

Thanks for the many posts on this.

Adam
